column4: What window managers are popular these days and work well with Ubuntu? (Apart from KDE/GNOME)
XFCE is available in the Xubuntu flavor... it is a light-weight GTK based one similar to GNOME without all the extra bloat
another one I am really liking is Enlightenment 17, though I am only just getting familiar with it
that's the beauty.. you can use whatever you like
